channel.title: Jagex and their standards
channel.description: I think their bans and offences seem just plain wrong sometimes. Like one time, all i said was "ur a nub" and i got an offence!

item.title: Jagex and their standards
item.dc:creator: @prickly_needle prickly needle
item.description:
@prickly_needle wrote:

lysol, some`…please? aww i farted! freakin stinks aye!

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex and their standards
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

[quote=“O M F G, post:5, topic:22556”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=34428.msg410860#msg410860 date=1162796352]
They are more then fair.

They’ve been known to give second chances to some autoer’s and whatnot. You shouldn’t get a second chance because it’s your responsibility to read and understand the rules.
[/quote]
FAIR!!!???I got an offence for sayin “poof”!!!When I appieled they ignored me!!!
I wrote them askin how poof is a cus word and they repled tellin me that they know i was on my acount at the time!!!WDF???I know that too!!!Those jackasses comepletely ignored me!!![/quote]

You’re posting on a cheating site, so the odds are you’ve broke a rule somewhere along the lines. And regarding their customer service… Yeah it does suck, but when you make an account you agree to their terms, and they don’t owe you anything more than stated.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex and their standards
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

I cu[quote=“prickly needle, post:10, topic:22556”]They did it to me too. I said somethin like “join the third rweich” and said i was sorry and heres the response i get “we have evidence to conclude you were on your account the timem of the incident”. I already freakin know! Dont ignore me![/quote]I couldn’t have put it better my freakin self…lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

thats true, if it wasnt for jagex maybe some of the bot makers wouldnt be intrested in java or scripting.( I even think kane wouldnt be intrested either.)[/quote]
good point, but still, if their gona make somtin, make it fair
theres NOTHING wrong with saying POOF
it IS wrong to IGNORE something instead of laying it off if ur 2 busy
